page.title: 07WHINNYHALL FARM - STOCK : 2
page.content:
Whinnyhall Farm
{STOCK - SHEEP}- A breeding stock of about 200 ewes is kept on the farm.
{140 ewes are half breds}and are put to Suffolk rams to produce fat lambs - the best of which are sold in August at Stirling market.
The remaining{60 ewes are pedigree} {stock - 50 being pedigree Suffolks}and {10 pedigree Blue Faced Leicesters. } These ewes are pure bred with their respective breed rams. The ewe lambs are retained as breeding stock and the tup (male) lambs are sold as stock sires to fat lamb producers.
